tooltip.value: {{ !components.textinput1.isValid ? "Hover over info icon for conditions regarding table name." : ""}}
Table names must start with a lowercase letter or underscore, followed by lowercase letters, numbers, or underscores, and of maximum 31 characters.

{{(components?.listview1?.data[listItem.id]?.column_name?.isValid ?? false) ? "" : "Column name must start with a lowercase letter or underscore, followed by lowercase letters, numbers, or underscores, and of maximum 31 characters."}}

{{components.listview1.data[listItem.id].default_value.isValid
  ? ""
  : !components.listview1.data[listItem.id].nullable.value &&
    components.listview1.data[listItem.id].default_value.value == ""
  ? "Default value cannot be empty if not nullable."
  : "Default value does not match with column type."}}

text.value:
<svg fill="none" stroke="#D00" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="width:22px;">
    <path d="m4 7h16" />
    <path d="m5 7 1 12a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h8a2 2 0 0 0 2-2l1-12" />
    <path d="m9 7v-3a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h4a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v3" />
    <path d="m10 12 4 4m0-4-4 4" />
</svg>

tooltip.value:
{{ !components.textinput1.isValid
  ? "The specified table name is either empty or invalid."
  : variables.tableColumns.length < 1
  ? "Please add a column to proceed."
  : variables.tableColumns
      .map(
        (row) =>
          !components.listview1.data[row.id].column_name.isValid ||
          !components.listview1.data[row.id].column_type.isValid ||
          !components.listview1.data[row.id].length.isValid ||
          !components.listview1.data[row.id].default_value.isValid
      )
      .includes(true)
  ? "The parameter(s) for the specified table columns is either empty or invalid."
  : ""}}

text.value: <svg fill="none" stroke="#888888" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="width:22px;"><path d="M9 5h-2a2 2 0 0 0 -2 2v12a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h10a2 2 0 0 0 2 -2v-12a2 2 0 0 0 -2 -2h-2"></path><path d="M9 3m0 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2h2a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v0a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-2a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2z"></path><path d="M9 12h6"></path><path d="M9 16h6"></path></svg>

tooltip.value: {{ !components.textinput4.isValid ? "Hover over info icon for conditions regarding table name." : ""}}

{{(components?.listview2?.data[listItem.id]?.add_column_name?.isValid ?? false) ? "" : "Column name must start with a lowercase letter or underscore, followed by lowercase letters, numbers, or underscores, and of maximum 31 characters."}}

{{components.listview2.data[listItem.id].add_default_value.isValid
  ? ""
  : !components.listview2.data[listItem.id].add_nullable.value &&
    components.listview2.data[listItem.id].add_default_value.value == ""
  ? "Default value cannot be empty if column is not nullable."
  : "Default value does not match with column type."}}

customRule.value:
{{ !["undefined", "bigserial", "serial", "uuid"].includes(
  components.listview2.data[listItem.id].add_column_type.value
) &&
(!components.listview2.data[listItem.id].add_nullable.value ||
  components.listview2.data[listItem.id].add_default_value.value != "")
  ? (
      {
        bigint: /^-?\d+$/,
        boolean: /^(true|false)$/,
        float4: /^-?\d{1,7}(\.\d+)?$/,
        float8: /^-?\d{1,15}(\.\d+)?$/,
        integer: /^-?\d+$/,
        numeric: /^-?\d+(\.\d+)?$/,
        text: /.+/,
        timestamp: /^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}$/,
        timestamptz: /^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}$/,
        varchar: /.+/,
      }[components.listview2.data[listItem.id].add_column_type.value || ""] ?? ""
    ).test(components.listview2.data[listItem.id].add_default_value.value || "")
    ? true
    : " "
  : true}}

text.value:
<svg fill="none" stroke="#D00" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="width:22px;">
    <path d="m4 7h16" />
    <path d="m5 7 1 12a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h8a2 2 0 0 0 2-2l1-12" />
    <path d="m9 7v-3a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h4a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v3" />
    <path d="m10 12 4 4m0-4-4 4" />
</svg>

tooltip.value: Table names must start with a lowercase letter or underscore, followed by lowercase letters, numbers, or underscores, and of maximum 31 characters.

{{ !components.textinput4.isValid
  ? "The specified table name is either empty or invalid."
  : variables.tableColumns.length < 1 &&
    Object.values(components.listview3.data).filter((row) => !row.include.value)
      .length < 1
  ? "Please add or uncheck a column to proceed."
  : variables.tableColumns
      .map(
        (row) =>
          !components.listview2.data[row.id].add_column_name.isValid ||
          !components.listview2.data[row.id].add_column_type.isValid ||
          !components.listview2.data[row.id].add_length.isValid ||
          !components.listview2.data[row.id].add_default_value.isValid
      )
      .includes(true)
  ? "The parameter(s) for the specified table columns is either empty or invalid."
  : ""}}

event.message: Failed to fetch the table's data! Please check and try again.
Failed to execute query! Please check and try again.

options.query:
SELECT
    table_name
FROM
    information_schema.tables
WHERE
    table_schema = 'public'
    AND table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
ORDER BY
    table_name;

{{`SELECT
    table_name,
    column_name,
    ordinal_position,
    column_default,
    is_nullable,
    data_type,
    udt_name
FROM
    information_schema.columns
WHERE
    table_name = '${components.table2.selectedRow.table_name}'
ORDER BY
    ordinal_position;`}}
